org.mapsforge.android.maps.overlay
Class CircleOverlay<Circle extends OverlayCircle>

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.mapsforge.android.maps.overlay.Overlay
          org.mapsforge.android.maps.overlay.CircleOverlay<Circle>
Type Parameters:
Circle - the type of circles handled by this overlay.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArrayCircleOverlay
public abstract class CircleOverlay<Circle extends OverlayCircle>
extends Overlay

CircleOverlay is an abstract base class to display OverlayCircles. The class defines some methods to access the backing data structure of deriving subclasses. Besides organizing the redrawing process it handles long press and tap events and calls onLongPress(int) and onTap(int) respectively.

The overlay may be used to indicate positions which have a known accuracy, such as GPS fixes. The radius of the circles is specified in meters and will be automatically converted to pixels at each redraw.

drawOverlayBitmap

protected void drawOverlayBitmap(android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                                 android.graphics.Point drawPosition,
                                 Projection projection,
                                 byte drawZoomLevel)
Description copied from class: Overlay
Draws the overlay on the canvas. All subclasses need to implement this method.

Specified by:
drawOverlayBitmap in class Overlay
Parameters:
canvas - the canvas to draw the overlay on.
drawPosition - the top-left position of the map relative to the world map.
projection - the projection to be used for the drawing process.
drawZoomLevel - the zoom level of the map.

getThreadName

protected String getThreadName()
Description copied from class: Overlay
Returns the name of the overlay implementation. It will be used as the name for the overlay thread. Subclasses should override this method to provide a more specific name.

Overrides:
getThreadName in class Overlay
Returns:
the name of the overlay implementation.

onLongPress

protected boolean onLongPress(int index)
Handles a long press event.

The default implementation of this method does nothing and returns false.

Returns:
